title: Ep 4: Panic! at the TalkTalk Board Room
description: Mobile provider TalkTalk suffered a major breach in 2015. The CEO tried her best to keep angry customers calm and carry on. The UK government and Metropolitan Police investigate the breach. We get a rare glimpse of how the CEO handles the crisis.
itunes:title: Panic! at the TalkTalk Board Room
itunes:author: Jack Rhysider
